tier.item: (25) In den bibel staet dat de stede van Betulia was beleyt
in the bible stands that the city of Betulia was besieged
van Olyfernuse ... ende waren die van Betulia in twyffele
of Olyfernus and were those of Betulia in doubt
omme de stede over te ghevene
for the city up to give
